content_parts.content:
The user page has been enhanced by introducing a new billing role field, facilitating the distinction between operational and business roles. Additionally, a new switch button now allows you to designate whether a user is external of the organization.

This update simplifies user access management by excluding external users, such as partner organization members, from the license billing process. This ensures precise user categorization and prevents unnecessary billing for external users, enhancing control over user access.

content_parts.title: Purchase order planning and Work order planning notifications

content_parts.content:
To let you know that the task is finished, a notification displays in the notification center:

  • When an MRP calculation request is completed, from the notification you can go to the Purchase order planning and Work order planning pages.
    The Work order planning page displays the work order category and type as optional, filterable columns on the main list.
  • When Purchase order planning or Work order planning has created the orders, from the notification you can go to a filtered list of the created orders in the main list on the Purchase order or Work order page.

The task dimension simplifies capturing task data for projects when you enter transactions. A task needs to be linked to a unique project, but a project can have multiple tasks.

If you integrate with Sage Intacct, you can create, update, and delete tasks when you synchronize.

Landed costs functionality is now available for purchase orders, so costs can be processed before goods have been received. The respective landed cost accrual and cost adjustment journal entries are automatically generated.

content_parts.content:
Three new parameters are added in the Intacct configuration page in the Defaults section:

Reset contact list: 

This setup enable you to remove the supplier/customer contact list in Intacct and recreate it with the addresses from the SDMO supplier/customer record.

This option should be OFF if the contact list in Intacct has existing addresses that you would like to keep.

Contact list category name:

This setup enables you to provide a category name for the Intacct supplier/customer contact list which is independent from the address name on SDMO.

Pre-defined category names:

Supplier:

  • Primary address
  • Pay-to address
  • Return-to address
  • Other address

Customer:

  • Primary address
  • Bill-to address
  • Primary ship-to address
  • Ship-to address
  • Other address

Exclude display contact from the contact list:

The hideDisplayContact / showDisplayContact setup in the Intacct mapping for the supplier and customer is replaced with this new parameter.

The HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT property in the mapping is no longer updatable and is set with the SDMO property intacctSupplier.hideDisplayContact for the VENDOR mapping or intacctCustomer.hideDisplayContact  for the customer. These SDMO properties are now set with this parameter.
